title: Pathfinder Proficiency Ranks
description: The five proficiency ranks available in Pathfinder RPG

name.description: Display name of the proficiency rank

value.description: Numeric bonus added to level for calculations

description.description: Rules description of this proficiency level

ranks.name: Untrained
ranks.description: You lack training in this area. Your proficiency bonus is +0.

ranks.name: Trained
ranks.description: You have basic training. Your proficiency bonus equals your level plus 2.

ranks.name: Expert
ranks.description: You are skilled in this area. Your proficiency bonus equals your level plus 4.

ranks.name: Master
ranks.description: You are highly skilled. Your proficiency bonus equals your level plus 6.

ranks.name: Legendary
ranks.description: You are among the best. Your proficiency bonus equals your level plus 8.
